CarService

best quality at affordable prices

— About us

We are a young dynamically developing team. The key to our success are our values:
  • we care about our clients as about ourselves
  • we complete the job
  • we are constantly improving for you
By following our values, we easily achieve our goals:
  • improving the quality of life of our clients through the implementation of our services
  • to change for the better the idea of ​​a car service in our region
  • become the best car service in terms of service level and customer satisfaction
Striving for the set goals, we fulfill the mission "A happy person in a serviceable car"

— Our services

Maintenance

  • Diagnostics
  • Changing oil and consumables
  • Scheduled maintenance of all systems

Engine repair

  • Engine diagnostics
  • Overhaul
  • Replacement of oil seals
  • Timing belt replacement

Suspension repair

  • Running gear diagnostics
  • Replacing shock absorbers
  • Replacement of silent blocks
  • Subframe repair

Repair air conditioners

  • Air conditioner diagnostics
  • Refueling the air conditioner
  • Fixing leaks
  • Compressor repair

Steering rack repair

  • Relay rail diagnostics
  • Restoration
  • Replacement of anthers
  • Steering rack replacement

Auto electrician

  • Electrical connection
  • Wiring fault repair
